dialogue: Here are your regular goals and here are your stretch goals.
The regular goals can be achieved by sacrificing your health and your personal life.
The stretch goals require all of that plus some sort of criminal conduct.
I'm guessing that your boss gave you the regular goals, and you came up with the stretch goals on your own.
That way, when I achieve the regular goals, you'll get a raise but I'll get none because I missed the stretch goals.
Then you'll get a bonus for keeping salaries below budget.
Maybe we should talk about the ultra-stretchy goals later.
